DOC.brief_summary: Pelvic organ prolapse ( POP ) common problem . Symptoms overactive bladder ( OAB ) present approximately 50 % patient POP . For many woman accompany symptom OAB important reason seek help POP . Surgical repair prolapse may improve OAB complaint . Persisting de novo OAB symptom strongly correlate dissatisfaction final result operation POP . The primary aim research project investigate difference prevalence ( i.e . improvement ) OAB bothersome OAB symptoms 6 12 month POP repair surgery . The secondary objective determine change bladder function 6 12 month surgery identify predictive factor persistence , disappearance de novo symptom OAB POP surgery . Women present POP undergo surgical treatment evaluate baseline surgery follow duration one year surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Study Overactive Bladder Women With Prolapse
DOC.criteria: Female patient , age 18 great , pelvic organ prolapse stage II IV define POPQ system Patient candidate prolapse repair surgery ( base history physical examination ) Patient capable fill bladder diary questionnaires understands Dutch write spoken language Patients currently use anticholinergic medication Patients neurological cause OAB Patients pregnant Patients history cancer pelvic region , treat radiotherapy surgery
